source.description: Snyk Code security rules tables (vendor documentation)

notes: Keys under languages[<lang>] are Snyk rule names as shown in the Snyk User Docs tables.
owasp_top_10_2021 uses OWASP Top 10 2021 IDs (A01..A10) parsed from 'OWASP:Axx' values in the docs tables.
Some rules legitimately have no OWASP category (Security Categories = 'None' in docs).

Sinatra Protection Layers Disabled.raw_security_categories: Sans Top 25, OWASP:A05, OWASP:A03, OWASP:A01, OWASP:A04
